item.description:
Update: 10/15/2012 - This event is no longer free...
Charge at the gate is  $10pp ( $5 per person in advance) (Ages 0-14 free admission)


Even if you have already registered, you must re-register to get the cheaper $5 rate...


http://www.nashobawinery.com

 

Regards,

Jonathan

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


This is a cross posting with the Wedeln Ski & Outdoors Club!

BLUEGRASS & BREWS

Sunday, October 21, 2012

Noon - 5:00 p.m.

Welcome to Nashoba Valley Winery for one of everyone's favorite festivals of the fall season. This festival highlights the hand crafted micro-brewed beers of our brewer.   Relax, sit back, and enjoy some bluegrass music bySouthern Rai

l.  Stroll by the pavilion, visit JAAS snack shack to purchase a cider donut or a caramel apple, savor the smells of our barbecue provided by the chef’s from our restaurant, J’s. And finally, we invite you to take a tour of our winery or simply taste many of our award winning wines.

 

SOUTHERN RAIL

 

Southern Rail’s music is high energy exuberant fun, with riveting harmonies, irreverent humor and sparkling banjo and mandolin solo work.  Their songs have graced Bluegrass Unlimited’s Top Thirty Singles Chart receiving heavy national airplay.  Southern Rail has a loyal fan base that makes every concert an event that the whole family can enjoy.

So relax, put down your blanket and enjoy the music. Arrive early. It fills up quickly

Bring a long folding table, camp chairs, food to share, and friendly dogs...

 

Food is available for sale, but the last 5 years, we have always brought food and non alcoholic drinks, wine, etc. to share.

Menu from Nashoba Valley for this event.

J's Barbecue Menu

Sandwiches - Includes a Bag of Chips

Hamburger                                           $6.00

Cheeseburger                                        $7.00

Hot Dog                                                $3.00

Veggie Burger                                        $6.00

J's Signature Dishes

J's Orchard Waldorf Salad                   $3.00

J's Smoked Chicken Corn Chowder     $4.00

Treats

Chocolate Chip Cookie                        $2.00

Sugar Cookie                                         $2.00

Beverages

Assorted Polar Soda                                $1.00

Bottled Water or  Sparkling Water          $1.00

Please bring camp chairs (highly recommended!) or blanket to lay out.

If people could bring a folding table, food / drink to share, friendly dogs and kids - it will make a great day...

GET THERE EARLY - I will arrive by 10:30 / 11:00  just to snag a spot!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Wedeln Ski & Outdoors Club Sign
item.name: Nashoba Valley Winery - Bluegrass and Brews Festival
